title: Collaborative Infrastructure Development Workshop for Enhancing Online Learning Accessibility

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Flexible progression considering work-learn balance for employees, ensuring smartphone-based accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three accessibility issues in online educational content and propose improvement strategies
Learners can collaboratively create an accessibility checklist using mobile-optimized collaboration tools (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet)
Learners can design at least one educational scenario in a VR simulation environment by applying accessibility support strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
